item.title: FEMA Employee Fired For Bypassing Homes With Trump Signs Says She Was Following Agency Protocol
item.description: Ex-FEMA supervisor indicates bypassing Trump supporters based on their perceived hostility is a widespread occurrence.

item.title: Kristi Noem Isn’t Courageous Enough To Be Trump’s Homeland Security Secretary
item.description: While Noem is certainly skilled at promoting herself, she doesn't have the courage required for this role.

item.title: Biden-Donor Judge Delays Proceedings In Lawfare Case After Trump’s Landslide Victory
item.description: Prosecutors want more time to determine how to proceed after Trump's win.

item.title: How To Make Legislatures Stop Working For Special Interests And Start Working For The People
item.description: Decentralizing power in the legislature is necessary if the people are to take back control of government from lobbyists and bureaucrats.

item.title: Newly Minted ‘Election Denier’ Sen. Bob Casey Refuses To Accept Loss
item.description: Sen. Casey took a break from solving crime, hunger, and war to spend time impeaching Donald Trump for asking questions about the 2020 election.
